name.description: the name as displayed on the UI.

slug.description: The game's URL slug on thunderstore. Defaults to the kebab-case version of name.

favorite.description: Whether the game is grouped under 'Popular communities' on thunderstore.io. Defaults to false.

modLoader.description: The mod loader to use for the game.

platforms.description: Info about the platforms where the game is available

steam.description: Steam's internal ID for the game.
